titleStmt.title: Dictionary, Natural Sciences & Medecine, by Ariel, part 1 of 2

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A dictionary of natural sciences and medecine by Édouard Ariel. 1st part of 2 parts. Part 2 = BnF Indien 141.
The Arabic pagination of BnF Indien 140 is continued in BnF Indien 141. Compare also 1 à 50 (BnF Indien 140, U1a, f[1]r) and 101 à 150 (BnF Indien 141, U1a, f[1]r).
Not mentioned by James (2000), while BnF Indien 141, its continuation, is.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not dated by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Written by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, Département des Manuscrits, Inventaire 7 = dons : manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, n° 1 à 3306: no. 1192.

Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38r, no. 140.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
